main event: A witness spotted a bright white light object moving in the sky over La Puente, California on September 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed at an elevation of 30-35 degrees and moved slightly ascending towards the Northwest., The sighting lasted for about 5 to 10 seconds and the object hovered before shooting straight up at a high speed., The object was larger than a star but smaller than a plane., There was no sound associated with the object., The object appeared to have a gray color with a light hue or glow on both sides.
